welcome-title: Data package for EURO2024 on us!
welcome-subtitle: Activate gift and get  Germany 1GB  for free
promocode-title: Enter this gift code in the Roamingo app to receive the gift.
promocode-note: You can activate the gift until June 30
guide-title: How do I activate the gift?
guide-1: Open Roamingo and navigate to Profile Tap on "Activate Gifts"
guide-2: Tap on Activate Gifts and enter the gift code - "EUROAMINGO"
guide-3: To receive the gift tap on "Accept"
guide-4: Germany 1GB is automatically added to your data packages list, tap on "Activate" and follow the instructions
